briefTitle: Study of CYP2C19 and ALDH3A1 Polymorphisms in Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: Pharmacogenetic Risk Factors of Doxorubicin-Cyclophosphamide Chemotherapy Related Toxicities in Breast Cancer Patients
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The frequency of the genetic polymorphisms of CYP2C19 in breast cancer patients
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Confirmed diagnosis of breast cancer.
2. Age ranging from 18 to 75 years old female.
3. Patients will take Doxorubicin-Cyclophosphamide regimen as chemotherapy treatment.

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Any other malignancy.
2. Previous treatment for metastatic disease.
3. Pregnancy or breastfeeding female.
4. Inadequate bone marrow and cardiac function.
5. Serious or uncontrolled medical conditions.
